addons.name: Focus Timer Pro
addons.short_description: Pomodoro timer with distraction blocking and productivity analytics
addons.full_description: Focus Timer Pro helps you stay productive using the Pomodoro Technique. Set custom work intervals, block distracting websites during focus sessions, and track your productivity over time with detailed analytics and reports.

addons.name: Dark Reader Universal
addons.short_description: Apply dark mode to any website with customizable themes
addons.full_description: Dark Reader Universal creates beautiful dark themes for websites on the fly. Reduce eye strain with customizable brightness, contrast, and sepia filters. Save your favorite site-specific settings and enjoy comfortable browsing at night.

addons.name: QuickNote Capture
addons.short_description: Capture notes, screenshots, and web clippings instantly
addons.full_description: QuickNote Capture lets you save ideas, screenshots, and web content with a single click. Organize your captures with tags and folders, sync across devices, and search through everything instantly. Perfect for research and knowledge management.

addons.name: Price Tracker & Alert
addons.short_description: Track product prices and get alerts when prices drop
addons.full_description: Never overpay again! Price Tracker & Alert monitors prices on thousands of online stores. Set price alerts, view historical price charts, and get notified when your favorite items go on sale. Supports Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and more.

addons.name: Translation Buddy
addons.short_description: Instant translation of web pages and selected text in 100+ languages
addons.full_description: Translation Buddy provides instant translations in over 100 languages. Translate entire web pages or just selected text with a simple click. Features include text-to-speech, dictionary definitions, and language learning tools. Powered by advanced AI translation.

addons.name: Video Downloader Plus
addons.short_description: Download videos from popular streaming sites in HD quality
addons.full_description: Video Downloader Plus lets you save videos from YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, and 1000+ other sites. Choose from multiple quality options including HD and 4K. Built-in converter supports MP4, AVI, and WebM formats. Fast downloads with resume capability.

addons.name: Password Generator Secure
addons.short_description: Generate ultra-secure random passwords with one click
addons.full_description: Password Generator Secure creates cryptographically strong passwords instantly. Customize length, character types, and complexity. Check password strength in real-time and never use weak passwords again. Privacy-focused with no data collection.

addons.name: Tab Manager Ultimate
addons.short_description: Organize, search, and manage hundreds of browser tabs efficiently
addons.full_description: Tab Manager Ultimate helps you conquer tab chaos. Search across all tabs instantly, save tab groups for later, suspend inactive tabs to save memory, and organize tabs by project or topic. Features vertical tab list, duplicate detection, and bulk operations.

addons.name: Code Snippet Manager
addons.short_description: Store, organize, and quickly insert code snippets while coding
addons.full_description: Code Snippet Manager helps developers save time by storing frequently used code snippets. Features syntax highlighting for 50+ languages, smart search, tagging system, and quick insertion. Sync your snippets across devices and share with team members.

addons.name: Weather Forecast Widget
addons.short_description: Real-time weather updates and 7-day forecast in your browser
addons.full_description: Weather Forecast Widget provides accurate weather information at a glance. Get current conditions, hourly forecasts, and 7-day predictions. Features severe weather alerts, multiple location support, and customizable display options. Beautiful animated backgrounds match current weather.

addons.name: Social Share Booster
addons.short_description: Quickly share content across all your social media platforms
addons.full_description: Social Share Booster makes sharing content effortless. Share articles, images, and videos to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and more with one click. Features customizable share buttons, scheduling options, and analytics tracking. Boost your social media engagement.

addons.name: Email Tracker Pro
addons.short_description: Track email opens, clicks, and get real-time notifications
addons.full_description: Email Tracker Pro tells you exactly when recipients open your emails and click on links. Get real-time notifications, detailed analytics, and insights into email engagement. Works with Gmail, Outlook, and other major email providers. Professional features for sales and marketing teams.
